This IS the Road Rash 3D Game. The bikes and caracthers are not 3D, but the scenery is. This is the version released for the 3DO and PC back in 1995. 

The Genesis version (Road Rash 1, 2 and 3) was completely made of sprites (including houses and even the ground was not made of polygons)

ps: the game DOESNT run (not even the SETUP) on Vista 64. I guess it works fine on Vista 32, because the message that pop-up is specifically about not running on 64 bit systems.
my guess is that people saying this is the first one are KIDS who never played the three Road Rash games released for the Genesis/MegaDrive.
